department.ch: 水文與海洋科學研究所碩士班
department.en: MSc in Hydrologocal and  Oceanic Sciences

goal.ch: 使修課同學具備執行參與港灣工程計畫所需相關背景與基礎知識，滿足參加國家公務人員高考三級港灣工程類科應考資格。
goal.en: Providing fundamental knowledge associated with harbor and port planing, design and construction to students and ensure the students are qualified to take the ROC civil service examination of harbor engineering division.

outline.ch:
第1部分 港灣工程概論：港口分類介紹，選址基本因素、維護水域靜定的方法，基礎設施、航道迴船池、防波堤、碼頭工程設計基本概念(第1週)
第2部分．港灣工程的環境要素
2.1 波浪學基礎：波浪理論與適用範圍介紹、微小振幅波理論、波浪分散關係式推導(第2週)
2.2 波浪分析推算：波浪譜簡介、波浪推算(SMB法等)、波浪傳遞與變形，包含 : 波浪折射、繞射(半無限防坡堤)與碎波 (第3週)
2.3 港灣配置與波浪引致的海岸漂沙活動，突堤效應與航道淤塞：海岸帶泥沙的沖刷、運移與淤積(第4週)
2.4 潮汐分析 : 潮汐水位觀測、分析及預測、潮流觀測 (第5週)
2.5 工程設計條件推算 : 極端值推算統計方法、防波堤佈置(第6週)
2.6 結構物的力學計算(I)：防波堤之波力計算，包含:重力、浮力、滑動摩擦力、波浪力與碼頭荷載(第7週)
2.7 結構物的力學計算(II): 護岸計算(第8週)
2.8 海岸防護與波浪溯升(Run-up) (第9週)
第3部分 近岸水動力數值模式
3.1 Mike 21與其他數值模式介紹(第10週)
3.2 如何設定計算區域的地形、邊界條件 (第11週)
3.3 波浪數值模式、近岸水動力數值計算實際操作與案例分享 (第12週)
3.4 可施工日計算與船舶停靠可工作日案例(第13週)
3.5 港灣靜穩度與港灣共振案例(第14週)
3.6 臺灣漁港淤沙與靜穩度案例(第15週)
第4部分 水工模型試驗(第16週)
4.1 相似性(第17週)
第5部分
分組口頭報告(第18週)、期末考
outline.en:
Part 1 Introduction to harbor engineering: introduction to port classification, basic factors for site selection, methods for maintaining stability of harbor, basic concepts of infrastructure, waterway return basins, breakwaters, and wharf engineering design (week 1)
Part 2. Environmental factors of harbor engineering
2.1 Basics of wave mechanics: introduction to wave theory and application scope, small amplitude wave theory, wave dispersion relation (week 2)
2.2 Wave analysis and calculation: introduction to wave spectrum, wave prediction (SMB method, etc.), wave transmission and deformation, including: wave refraction, diffraction (semi-infinite breakwater) and waves breaking (Week 3)
2.3 Harbor configuration and wave-induced coastal sediment transport, groin effect and channel sedimentation: erosion, migration, and deposition of sediment in the coastal zone (Week 4)
2.4 Tidal analysis: tide observation, analysis and prediction, tidal current observation (Week 5)
2.5 The design factors estimation: Extreme value estimation statistical method, breakwater layout (week 6)
2.6 Mechanical calculation of structures (I): Calculation of wave force of breakwaters, including: gravity, buoyancy, sliding friction, wave force and pier load (Week 7)
2.7 Mechanical calculation of structures (II): Bank protection calculation (Week 8)
2.8 Coastal Protection and Wave run-up (Week 9)
Part 3 Nearshore Hydrodynamic Numerical Model
3.1 Introduction to Mike 21 and other numerical modes (Week 10)
3.2 How to set the mesh and boundary conditions of the calculation area (Week 11)
3.3 Practical operations and case sharing of wave numerical models and nearshore hydrodynamic numerical calculations (Week 12)
3.4 Calculation of available construction days and downtime of harbor (week 13)
3.5 Harbor Stability and Resonance Cases (Week 14)
3.6 Taiwan Fishing Port Siltation and Static Stability Case (Week 15)
Part 4 Physical modeling in hydraulic and ocean engineering (Week 16)
4.1 Similarity (Week 17)
Part 5
Oral presentation (week 18) ＆ Final exam

海岸工程，嚴愷，海洋出版社出版(2002)
港灣及海域工程，成功大學湯麟武教授編著，中國土木水利工程學會出版

近岸水動力學，海洋大學許泰文教授編著，科技圖書公司出版

gradMethod.ch:
期中、期末考(40％)
平日作業、課堂報告與討論表現(60％)
gradMethod.en:
Written Tests (40％)
Class presentation, Handout and Assignments (40％)
